embeddedItem.name: Life Transmitter
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, immediately heals one downed character for <nobr>10%</nobr> of the character's Max HP.
embeddedItem.lore:
A simple device used to provide life-saving oxygen.

"Breathe in, breathe out. You'll be fine."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

356475.name: Gaseous liquid
356475.lore:
Is it fog, rain, or wind?
You can't tell if it's still in the container without lifting the lid.

"The answer my friend, is blowing in the gaseous liquid..."
"The answer is blowing in the gaseous liquid."
comeFrom: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

440513.name: Mechanical Parts
440513.lore:
Essential components of all machines with strange shapes and specific functions.
Without them, nothing can be made.

"With the same parts, Screwllum can make entire planets and create cyborgs. But you can only make me a watch that runs seven seconds late every day."
"Seven seconds is good enough! Just a hair later than the clocks they use in observatories."
comeFrom: Robot Settlement: Automatons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station
